Database Module¶

class modbus_gui_app.database.db_handler.Backend¶

This class is used to instantiate a connection to the database and provides the methods needed deal with that connection.

db_close()¶

Method used to close the database connection.

db_read(current_db_index)¶

This method is used to get the information stored in the database.

Parameters

current_db_index (int) – An index used to specify the reading location in the database.

Returns

Return a dictionary that contains the information stored in the database on the location

given by the ‘current_db_index’.

Return type

dict

db_write(dictionary)¶

Method used to store the input data into the database.

Parameters

dictionary (dict) – The dictionary that contains the values to be stored into the database.

Error Logger Module
